languages.text: Из астропата на пьедестале будто высасывает жизненную энергию другая фигура в такой же рясе.

traits.locale_text: Из астропата на пьедестале будто высасывает жизненную энергию другая фигура в такой же рясе.

languages.text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.
languages.original_text: Из астропата на пьедестале будто высасывает жизненную энергию другая фигура в такой же рясе.

traits.locale_text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be sucking the life force out of him.
Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be sucking the life force out of him.
Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.
Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.

Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.

languages.text: Sobre el pedestal, junto al Astrópata, se encuentra otra figura con sus mismas vestimentas que parece estar drenando su fuerza vital.
languages.original_text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.

traits.locale_text: Sobre el pedestal, junto al Astrópata, se encuentra otra figura con sus mismas vestimentas que parece estar drenando su fuerza vital.

languages.text: 台座の上にいる感応通信官の隣に、全く同じ服装の何者かが立っていて、感応通信官から生命力を吸っている。
languages.original_text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.

traits.locale_text: 台座の上にいる感応通信官の隣に、全く同じ服装の何者かが立っていて、感応通信官から生命力を吸っている。

languages.text: 另一位穿着同样长袍的人站在星语者身边的基座上，似乎正在从这位星语者身上榨取生命的力量。
languages.original_text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.

traits.locale_text: 另一位穿着同样长袍的人站在星语者身边的基座上，似乎正在从这位星语者身上榨取生命的力量。

languages.text: Neben dem Astropathen steht eine weitere Gestalt in identischen Gewändern auf dem Podest, die ihm offenbar die Lebensenergie entzieht.
languages.original_text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.

traits.locale_text: Neben dem Astropathen steht eine weitere Gestalt in identischen Gewändern auf dem Podest, die ihm offenbar die Lebensenergie entzieht.

languages.text: Aux côtés de l'astropathe, sur un piédestal, se tient une autre silhouette vêtue à l'identique qui semble drainer sa force vitale.
languages.original_text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.

traits.locale_text: Aux côtés de l'astropathe, sur un piédestal, se tient une autre silhouette vêtue à l'identique qui semble drainer sa force vitale.

languages.text: Kaidede Astropat'ın yanında aynı kıyafetleri kuşanmış başka birisi duruyor. Görünüşe göre Astropat'ın yaşam gücünü tüketiyor.
languages.original_text: Standing next to the Astropath on the pedestal is another figure in identical vestments, which seems to be draining the life force from him.
